mapper.update: update T_MYONE set income=#{income}, incomeDate=#{incomeDate} where accountNo=#{accountNo}
mapper.insert: insert into T_FIXED_COST(accountNo, pocketCode, fixedName, fixedCost, fixedDate) values(#{accountNo}, 2, #{fixedName}, #{fixedCost}, #{fixedDate})
mapper.select: select * from T_FIXED_COST where accountNo=#{accountNo} and fixedName=#{fixedName}
select accountNo, sum(fixedCost) as fixedSum from T_FIXED_COST group by accountNo having accountNo=#{accountNo}
